name: Cave Explorer (Cous, EmilyTheLion)
description:
Cave Explorer

A game created for weekly game jam 144 - "Into the dark" 

Explore the dark depths of the sea, what will you find? 

Controls

Use A + D to turn / tilt your submarine

Use Spacebar to thrust

Pressing the 'n' key will allow you to skip to the next level.  ;_; 

Created by:

https://cous.itch.io/ - Design

https://EmilyTheLion.itch.io/ - Audio  (Music)
